mapper.delete: DELETE phy_student_info, phy_student_health_info, phy_item_result FROM phy_student_info LEFT JOIN phy_student_health_info ON phy_student_info.id = phy_student_health_info.phy_student_id LEFT JOIN phy_item_result ON phy_student_health_info.id = phy_item_result.phy_health_id WHERE phy_student_info.id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
